Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about creating viral videos from Reddit content

Video Tokens are credits that allow you to create and export videos. Each video you create and export uses one token. Tokens are refreshed monthly based on your subscription plan.

You can use any public Reddit content that follows our content guidelines. We recommend using posts that are engaging, have good discussion, and are appropriate for your target audience.

We support all major short-form video formats including MP4, MOV, and WebM. Videos are optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts with the correct aspect ratios and quality settings.

Yes! All plans include access to our template library. You can customize text, colors, animations, background music, and more to match your brand and style.

Starter plan users have access to our help center and email support. Pro plan users get priority support with faster response times and access to our advanced analytics dashboard.

Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period, and you'll keep all your created videos.
